title: ISic003701. Epitaph of Martirios
body:
1ἔζησεν Μαρτίριος ἔτη εἴκοσι δύω
2εἰρήνη σοι (Χριστό)ς

1ΕΖΗΣΕΝΜΑΡΤΙΡΙΟΣΕΤΗΕΙΚΟΣΙΔΥΩ
2ΕΙΡΗΝΗΣΟΙ☧Σ

Facsimile Images

Apparatus criticus

  • Text after De Amico and Kaibel;
  • As Kaibel notes, De Amico places interpuncts between each word, but given the confusion around the numeral at the end of line 1, these seem unlikely to have been present on the original;
  • 1: Kaibel: Μαρτ[ύ]ριος; De Amico: ΕΙΚΟΣΙΑ.ΥΩ, reasonably interpreted by Kaibel as a misreading of ΔΥΩ

English translation

Jonathan Prag

Martirios lived 22 years. Peace upon you. Christos

commentary

bibliography

  • 14.0543a https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001072
  • 4.9486 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001252
  • Amico 1741 265 no.7 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002186
